name: Dice salad
description:
You work as a clerk for an insane company that gets random produce. Trying to make sense of your inventory and satisfy your clients. Good luck employee!

Click on dice on the right side to get a new item.
Green dice will give you vegetables.
Red dice will give you animal products.
Blue dice will give you side dishes.
Yellow dice will give you exactly what you customer needs.

Right click on dice to destroy them,
Also right click on items to throw them to the RecycleBin

Click on a client's ticket to serve them.
If you don't have what you need, either wait for a dice to give you the missing item,
Or just click RECEIPT button to send the customer angry.

A customer getting items they don't desire or missing items might make them angry.
Customers might also lose patience.
Both of these can decrease your rating score.

If your rating drops to 0 you are fired and it is game over,
Submit your name to enter the high-score table
